channel.title: Fiesta Jazz
channel.description:
<p>Since October 2000, Fiesta Jazz has been playing Latin jazz from traditional, instrumental and vocal Afro-Caribbean, Spanish and Brazilian jazz, as well as Latin-influenced fusion played by non-Latin musicians, along with fusions of jazz and Latin American folk rhythms.</p>
<p>As a Venezuelan myself, the music expresses my Latin American and Spanish culture.</p>

item.title: Episode No. 1285 presented & produced by Saúl Zavarce
item.description:
<p><span style="font-size:24px"><strong>Tribute to some of the greats of Latin jazz</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size:20px">Forever greateful to those that broke the ground helping to develop what we know as Afro-Cuban, Brazilian, Venezuelan, Spanish and Dominican Jazz.</span></p>
item.author: Saúl Zavarce

item.description: <p><span style="font-size:20px">Dedicated to the memory and legacy of Eddie Palmieri (1936-2025)</span></p>
item.author: Saúl Zavarce

item.title: Episode No. 1289 presented & produced by Saúl Zavarce
item.description: <p><span style="font-size:22px"><strong>New releases plus remembering an interview done with Eddie Palmieri in 2011 before his first visit to Melbourne in 2012.</strong></span></p>
item.author: Saúl Zavarce
